string.value: Dr. Kim at the Omega Sector HQ is holding a Physical Fitness Event! Check the #bEvent Schedule on the website#k to see what time the event will occur on your world.
Transform into an Alien Gray and go to the top of the Henesys Pet-Walking Road after you answer the agents' questions. The Maple Admin will tell you which agents you need to meet.
You have completed Dr. Kim's Omega Physical Fitness Footrace.
Ta-da! I'm Agent M! The aliens are abducting every human they see, but you, #b#h0##k, seem like you have what it takes to become a Mesoranger and rescue everyone!

If you want to become an Honorable Mesoranger, you must first transform into an alien yourself so they don't abduct you. However, the transformation will last for 30 minutes, which means you'll be stuck as an alien that whole time. Do you still want to try?

You have 30 minutes, starting now, to follow the Maple Admin, meet the secret agents, and pass their tests. The first person to meet Agent C will become the Honorable Mesoranger. Now, why don't you first go and see if you can collect some clues from the Maple Admin and meet #bAgent E#k?
Why did you even ask if you weren't interested?
Have you met all the agents?
